refnamediv.refpurpose: creates the wallpapersetter file and detects the wallpapersetter installed

refentry.refsect1: Stability Level Stable, unless otherwise indicated

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This application class creates the wallpapersetter file and detects the wallpapersetter installed

This application class detects the wallpapersetter listed in wallpapersetter file installed and stores this information in two lists, one for the wallpapersetter found and the other for the command (normally the fullscreen command). This class also creates the wallpapersetterfile that contains definitions for known wallpapersetters and the command used to set the wallpaper.

refsect2.title: AnypaperWallpapersetter
refsect2.para: Contains a list of wallpapersetter found and a list of commands used for them

listitem.simpara: contains a list of wallpapersetter found
contains a list of commands used for the wallpapersetter found

refsect2.title: anypaper_wallpapersetter_detect ()
refsect2.para: Generate a list of found wallpapersetters and other for the associated commands.

listitem.simpara: file that contains the wallpapersetters command definition

refsect2.title: anypaper_wallpapersetter_file ()
refsect2.para: Generate a file with names of wallpapersetter and the associated commands.

listitem.simpara: filename to store the wallpapersetters command definition
